citation: Proclamation under the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) Amendment Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) Amendment Act 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) Amendment Act 2017 fix 3 December 2018 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

19 November 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Police, Fire and Emergency Management

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 November 2018

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police, Fire and Emergency Management.
